select menu_id "menu_id",menu_name "menu_name",menu_url "menu_url", root_link "rootlink" from sc_menu where menu_id in ( select distinct menu_id from user_menu_rela where user_id= #userId# union select distinct menu_id from role_menu_rela a, role_user_rela b where a.role_id = b.role_id and b.user_id = #userId#
) and menu_pid='0' order by menu_order

select menu_id "id",menu_name "text",menu_url "url", root_link "rootlink", CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sc_menu b WHERE b.menu_pid = a.menu_id) THEN 'closed' ELSE 'open' END "state" from sc_menu a where menu_id in ( select distinct menu_id from user_menu_rela where user_id= #userId# union select distinct menu_id from role_menu_rela a, role_user_rela b where a.role_id = b.role_id and b.user_id = #userId#
) and menu_pid=#id# order by menu_order
